title: Sometimes it works
comment: But on Aviate launcher, I rarely get an image, it's usually just a blank space. Pity, because I want it to be the center of my main homescreen.

title: Brilliant. ...but
comment: Unfortunately it doesn't change daily. ....well doesn't change at all....hope this will be solved as it flaws the purpose

title: Innovative
comment: Great Idea.. I'm an Aviate user and would honestly like to see more Aviate widget apps out there. I've been using your app for a fee days looking forward to the picture changing daily. Unfortunately that's not the case.

title: Crashes my nova launcher prime
comment: I'm running 1.3. Whenever I try to drag the widget from my app drawer, the launcher crashes and restarts. I'm on a deodexed Samsung stock ROM running 4.1.2 if that helps. Also, there is no app icon in the app drawer, not sure whether that's intended.  I was able to add a widget by long tapping the home screen, but it turns out to be empty and crashes on interaction

Thanks for the bug report, I thought this would be fixed with 1.2.
Could you send me an email (the address is listed on the bottom of the page) so I can contact you directly?
I hope I can get this fixed ASAP but since this is a memory management issue it's hard to reproduce.

Thanks for the report.
Could you please check if this still happens with version 1.3 and if so, report it here: https://github.com/timvdalen/gizmooi/issues/2
That would be very helpful.
I'm particularly interested if the photo ever changes from the preview (which should stop the freeze).

title: Makes phone run extremely slow
comment: 10+ seconds to swipe between home pages on aviate. Removed and slow down was completely gone.

Thanks for the report.
Could you please check if this still happens with version 1.3 and if so, report it here: https://github.com/timvdalen/gizmooi/issues/2
That would be very helpful.
I'm particularly interested if the photo ever changes from the preview (which should stop the freeze).

title: Much better
comment: Horrible slowdown before the update, works just fine now. I love the photos also, great widget. Nexus 4 with Nova Launcher.

title: Causes slow down
comment: Samsung galaxy note i717 running cyanogenmod 10.1.2 and upon putting this widget on my homescreen it causes my phone to run horrendously. Nova will become so slow it takes around 30 seconds to swipe left to the next home screen. When i removed the widget everything was back to normal.

I was able to reproduce this by making the widget crash so I suspect that is what happened in your case.

I just updated the app which should fix the crash.
Could you please try and see if version 1.1 still causes these performance issues?

title: Great app
comment: But for some reason I do not get the white border around the image?  Edit: thanks for your quick reply, I've tried it on both stock touchwiz and apex.

The white border only appears on the lock screen as some launchers already provide a border around the widget (for example the one in the screenshots).
I'm going to see if I can detect this and add a border accordingly.

title: Didn't work
comment: Widget would not load on home screen - droid razer maxx

Thanks for the feedback, I think the photo's I'm loading are too big for the screen of the razr maxx.
I'll publish an update ASAP.

Edit: Published, please let me know if it still won't load.
